participant_1.background:
I try my best to keep up with my family, but it can be difficult with my busy schedule.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
i enjoy broadway shows.
i am the youngest of 3.
my parents are in there 80s.

participant_2.background:
I'll call my mom over to see the new couch.
i went to an elite ivy league school.
i like basketball.
i was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
i am all about family and fun.

content.text: I am good! How are you?
I am doing well. I am a navy brat and I have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
Wow! That is a lot! Were you able to make friends?
I was able to make some friends, but it was hard to keep up with them because I was always moving.
I know what you mean. I moved a lot as a kid too.
I am glad you know what I mean. I am trying to keep up with my family now that I am older, but it can be difficult.
I know what you mean. My parents are in their 80s and I want to spend more time with them, but it is hard with my busy schedule.
I am glad to hear that you want to spend more time with your parents. I am sure they would appreciate it.
I know they would. I am going to call my mom over to see my new couch.
That sounds like a great idea. I hope you have a great time!
